overview:
Steven James is a serious VFX ZONE TRIPPER :)

Never goes anywhere without one thing: INTEGRITY.

Not only does he come to the table with his signature business savvy talent, powerful speeches and jaw-dropping energy, he brings a serious level of fear, focus, a marketable clean-cut look.

His typically rational business style is awesome and his writing style is a terrifying realm of the supernatural guided phantasmagorical creations.

Steven James is a old school conservative and a new school progressive.

He is a quintessential entrepreneur. With the BEST Teachers: George Lucas & J.J. Abrams.

NO EGO HERE - He is as WICKED as they come.

Nevertheless he is only one of a very few in the VFX industry who gives a crap about his team.

Speaks highly of dedication of the truly obvious high level connections to the entertainment industry.

With this, you can only learn that from George Lucas.

ONE Vision - ONE Dynasty - MDXVI Cryptarchy VFXÂ®
